ARABIC: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا ٱلذِّكْرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is We Who have sent down the Reminder and We Who will preserve it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have sent down this Exposition, and We will guard it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: As for the Admonition, indeed it is We Who have revealed it and it is indeed We Who are its guardians.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We Ourselves have revealed the Quran and We are its Protectors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed We have sent down the Qur’an, and indeed We Ourselves surely are its Guardians. (This is one of the miracles of the Qur’an – no one has been able to change even one letter of its text, despite every effort. It has remained in its original form since the 6th Century (A. D) and will remain so forever. Other Holy Books such as the Torah and the Bible have lost their originality.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, We, it is We Who revealed the Dhikr (i.e. the Qur'an) and surely We will guard it (from corruption).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We have revealed the Reminder and We will most surely be its guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then they would not be respited. It is We who have sent down the Remembrance, and We watch over it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! We, even We, reveal the Reminder, and lo! We verily are its Guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is We who have sent down the Reminder and We will, most surely, safeguard it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! it is We who have revealed the Admonition, and verily We are the guardians thereof.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed We have sent down the Reminder, and indeed We will preserve it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We have, without doubt, sent down the Message; and We will assuredly guard it (from corruption).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily We: It is We Who have sent down the Dhikr (i.e. the Quran) and surely, We will guard it (from corruption).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It is We who sent down the Koran, and We watch over it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Surely We revealed the Message, and We will surely preserve it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, it is We who sent down the Qur'an and indeed, We will be its guardian.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:9] Verily it is We (nahnu emphasises the subject of inna, or [functions as] a separating pronoun) Who have revealed the Remembrance, the Qur’ān, and assuredly We will preserve it, against substitution, distortion, additions and omissions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! We, even We, reveal the Reminder) We sent Gabriel with the Qur'an, (and lo! We verily are its) the Qur'an's (Guardian) from satans such that they do not add or diminish from it anything nor change its judgements; it is also said that this means: We are Guardian of Muhammad (pbuh) from the disbelievers and satans.
